entries.title: ArtStation will allow artists to opt out of AI programs using their creations, but concerns remain
entries.description: The move comes after a widespread protest on the platform.

entries.title: Automate the collapse of reality in clicker Antimatter Dimensions, now on Steam
entries.description: Another article where we apologize about your free time going away.

entries.title: Maupiti Island was a detective game unlike any other
entries.description: We're rerunning Richard Cobbett's classic Crapshoot column, in which he rolled the dice and took a chance on obscure games—both good and bad.

entries.title: Check out the demo for this sci-fi shooter fusing retro and modern elements
entries.description: Selaco's based on the Doom engine, but its inventive game world and diverse influences wouldn't tell you that.

entries.title: Legendary programmer John Carmack leaves Meta: 'This is the end of my decade in VR'⁠
entries.description: The Doom co-creator had long championed VR as a crucial next step in computer technology.

entries.title: Riot files to terminate League of Legends sponsorship deal with failed crypto exchange FTX
entries.description: This was the first year of Riot's seven-year partnership with FTX.

entries.title: Almost 5 years after Frostpunk, its influence can still be felt in new city builders
entries.description: 11 bit studios' chilling society simulator had a lasting impact on the new generation of city building games.

entries.title: Today's Wordle 546 answer and hint for Saturday, December 17
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #546 puzzle.
